main_memory.final_goal: 007执行北京到哈尔滨7日游的旅行策划
sub_agent_summaries: Task 1 (确定旅行日期和出发时间，以便安排交通和住宿): Task completed (timeout).
Task 2 (查询北京到哈尔滨的交通方式（如飞机、火车），并比较价格和时间): Task completed (timeout).
Task 3 (预订北京到哈尔滨的往返交通票): Task completed (timeout).
Task 4 (查询哈尔滨的住宿选项（如酒店、民宿），并预订7晚住宿): Task completed (timeout).
Task 5 (规划哈尔滨7日游的每日行程，包括景点、活动和餐饮): Task completed (timeout).
Task 6 (估算旅行总预算，包括交通、住宿、餐饮、门票等费用): Task completed (timeout).
Task 7 (整理旅行策划文档，包括行程表、预订信息和注意事项): Task completed (timeout).
main_memory.global_summary: The AI is managing a travel planning process for a trip from Beijing to Harbin. It has received and acknowledged completion reports from seven sub-agents, each of which handled a specific task: determining travel dates, comparing transportation options, booking round-trip tickets, finding and booking a 7-night stay, planning a daily 7-day itinerary, estimating the total budget, and compiling all the information into a final travel document. All tasks were completed with a timeout status.
